name: Beverly Stokley
text: These guys rock!  My previous lawn service company had gotten my lawn into such poor shape, I thought we might have to re-sod parts of it. I had bald spots, weeds and yellow grass all over the place. It was ugly. The Southern Lawns guys turned it around with just one treatment!  Within a month or so, my lawn was looking lush and green again. They are very responsive and address any concerns or questions promptly and cheerfully.  And, their prices are less than the other guys! Quality, courtesy and a reasonable price. What's not to love?

resp.text: Thank you so much Beverly for the kind review! We are so glad you're happy with our services!

name: Martin&Susanne Sweet
text: Thanks to Southern Lawns we've got the best looking lawn in the cul-de-sac. The weeds are under control.

name: Bam Boo
text: My new yard was full of weeds , now it’s weed free!  Would definitely recommend !

name: Melissa Kirkland
text: The best lawn care service in Auburn!! My family has been using Southern Lawns for years and their quality service and products can’t be beat. Top notch professionals, friendly and my yard looks the best it has ever looked. Also, love the mosquito repellent service as my 4 year old loves to play outdoors. It makes a huge difference! A++

name: Robin L
text: Very professional and reliable, and our lawn looks great!!!  I highly recommend Southern Lawns.  Plus, their prices are far more reasonable than TruGreen's prices!!

resp.text: Robin, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review and we're thrilled you're so happy with your lawn!

name: Judy Hinton
text: I have worked with Mike Willett for too many years to remember and he is great. He is a real pro you can always depend on and I'm alway getting positive comments about my yards. Mike and Southern Lawns are the pest in the industry. Rod Hinton

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Judy! We are so happy to hear you're happy with Mike's work!

name: kay meriwether
text: Have been using Southern Lawns for a few years now. Always very nice and always come when scheduled. I know they have been behind with all the rain and trying to catch up. If I have to leave a message they always return my call promptly. Very pleased and would recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kay and we appreciate your patience when the weather gets us behind. We're glad you're happy with the work we do. We appreciate you!

name: Drew Gunn
text: You're not going to find a better group of people to do business with. They are always fair, courteous and friendly. We've been using them at our office, Thompson Insurance, for a couple of years now and they always do a great job. I highly recommend them over any others we've tried in the past.

name: Anna McKee
text: Southern Lawns has made all the difference in our yard!  An added bonus is the mosquito control service.  Very reliable and great customer service!!  I highly recommend them for all of you lawn care needs!

name: Dave Stever
text: Used Southern Lawns years ago and decided to get back with them again! Great job and will tell you exactly what you need for your lawn! No more fire ants in  my yard and yard looks wonderful! Great folks that come out to your house and very friendly! Thanks for your hard work!

name: Brandon Mack
text: Friendly people, great communication.

resp.text: Brandon, thank you so much for the kind review! We appreciate you!

name: Bob Hunt
text: The people at Southern Lawns seem nice but after two years of their treatments I mostly have crabgrass. I used to have a nice lawn but they destroyed it telling me these treatments were ok for centipede grass but apparently not. Beware!!!

name: Lauren bishop
text: Professional, friendly, and easy to work with! I am so thankful to have found Southern Lawns. I was referred to them by a friend. The monthly mosquito treatment is a must if we want to be comfortable being outside during the warm months.

name: Shawn Cook
text: Great company with awesome customer service and yard care specialists. Cannot beat the price and the results are great. I would highly recommend.

name: laurie miorana
text: Just started services with Southern Lawns and so far we are pleased. Great customer service and price and they treat all our lawn care needs.

name: Jon Dorman
text: Have only had our house in Columbus GA since July but so far Southern Lawns has taken great care of us.  The previous owners used them so we kept the service active...

name: Michael Pacer
text: Great company...great people.  My builder put sod directly over clay.  Southern Lawns has worked with me over the past 3 years to improve soil health.  The have customized treatments based on soil samples and have routinely given me advice on improving the soil.  Today, I have beautiful green grass that grows uniformly throughout.

name: warrick henry
text: Great service. Always calls ahead. Treat problem areas without being asked.

name: Bill Ingalls
text: Southern Lawns are the best!   They are very knowledgeable and my yard looks great!   They work with their clients to improve the soil structure.   I strongly recommend them!

name: Stephen
text: I used another service before who promised to keep my yard true and green but for a hefty price. So far, Southern Lawn has done just as good a job but for a fraction of the price. I'll write another review when I see if Southern Lawn can kill the button weed in my yard that the other service never could defeat. The customer service is much better than the competitors as it is nice to deal with a local person who is friendly but still be able to pay my bill online. I highly recommend Southern Lawns.

name: Melanie Ward
text: We've used Southern Lawns for years and they are awesome and always accommodating.  We moved within Auburn and are using their services again.  Very nice people, great quality of work, and affordable prices.  Highly recommend.

name: Michelle Turrentine
text: I've had a wonderful experience with Southern Lawns. They answered all my questions and were very knowledgeable about everything lawn related. They are professional and courteous - a good all-around company!

name: Sue Linares
text: Very happy with this service. They are always professional and have never over promised or under delivered. We recently had an issue with mole crickets and they were super knowledgeable about a treatment option and took the time to educate me and explain. I would definitely recommend them.

name: Accounts Payable
text: Love this company! We use them for mosquito treatment and they are the best!

name: Dusty Sharpe
text: After using several competitors I decided to try Southern Lawns. Best decision ever! Everyone has been extremely courteous, professional and generally concerned about my lawn. Keep up the good work!

name: Sarah Meriwether Cook
text: Southern Lawns keeps my yard looking wonderful year round! The staff is always helpful if I have any questions, and I really like the online payment option.

name: Angela Mayberry
text: Great job. Lawn looks awesome!!

text: What a treat it is to work with them. They are very knowledgeable and helpful.

text: Love them and their friendly service and their fair price.

name: Jacob Mcnair

name: Emmie Sanders
text: An absolute nightmare to get in touch with. There is absolutely no way to speak with a local representative without going through the national service. I don't understand why anyone would use them when communication with virtually every other pest control or termite bond service is so much easier. And THEN on top of that, they're expensive.

resp.text: Thank you, We appreciate your star rating and would like to discuss how we can improve your service experience. Please send an email to socialsupport@terminix.com listing details of your experience, full service address and the phone number associated with the account.

name: Whitney Flynn
text: I took time out of work to be home for a service scheduled one day, and they never showed.  I called the guy who called me the night before to confirm, and he never answered.  I called the office, and they said they rescheduled for another day, and they still never showed.  No one answered their phone, I was completely ignored.  Will not be recommending Terminix to friends and family.

resp.text:
Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Whitney. We apologize for your recent experience and would like to help you.
Please send us an e-mail at socialsupport@terminix.com including your full-service address, copy of review and the phone number associated with the account or call 1-800-TERMINIX

name: Torie Krieger
text: My technician, Mark Stojkovic, was awesome! He was able to service my home quickly, and was super friendly and professional. He was done quickly and did a thorough job; we have seen a drastic improvement in the pests in our home in just a day’s time! Can’t recommend him enough!

name: McArthur Ray
text: Mark was very friendly and my questions were answered precise and informatively. Thank You for having such a Great Technician!

resp.text: We're proud to serve customers like you, Mcarthur! Thanks for leaving us a rating.

name: Arpad Matta
text:
The sales person came same day. He told me that I will have to leave the house for four hours and they guaranty the work for 90 days. He tried to charge my card 3 times and told me that the pay wasn’t approved, so he entered my check information which went through. The techs were supposed to come next day (Wednesday) around noon. At noon I called the sales person to ask when are they going to come. He said he will see what he can do. The 2 techs showed up around 2 o’clock. They told me that I can’t enter the house for 4 hours and the room until next Monday. Also, that I can’t clean the white chemicals for 30 days. They pulled the pillow covers and some other coverings and told me to take them out, including the pillows. My bad, should have asked for written contact and what happens after the application. Next day I checked my card an bank account. They pulled the money from my bank account and 2(two) times from my card. Another charge was pending. I called and wast told that there was an issue with the software. They returned the money on the card after 5(five) days. After a week I entered the room with the intention to sleep there. It was awful! No way I could have slept there for 3 weeks with chemicals dumped all over (it was supposed to be a fine dust. I came out and sealed the door with tape. After a few days same issue in another room. Since I was told if needed, they will come back, I called two days ago early in the morning and talked to the sales person. He said he will get back. Nothing after 2 full days, so I called another company. Another part of the contract wasn’t fulfilled right either. This is how I lost $550 just to be burdened to spend hours to clean up the room and pay somebody else to do the job they didn’t do right. Think before you want to hire them.
I will upload some pictures if it is allowed.

text: I never thought pest control was necessary if I didn’t see bugs.  I was very wrong.  Magic city sprayed my house and apparently the critters were getting in through my air conditioning unit and hiding very well.  They are very affordable, efficient, personable, and thorough.  I highly recommend them!!!

text: The men called before they were on their way to let me know they were coming. When they arrived, they were very polite and they explained the entire process and all products they were going to use. They explained what to expect and they were very thorough in investigating and treating. They even said they can treat for spiders and others we called said that couldn’t be done. I’m very happy with our experience. The price was MUCH lower than we had paid in the past.

resp.text: Thank you for writing about your experience!

name: Iron City Pest
text: Kind and respectable. A great example of decency and integrity in our industry.

name: Brittani Shelton
text:
It's rare that I think someone deserves a full five stars, but let me tell you why this company deserves it. We had a wasp problem at our house. I had to spray bug killer inside the house when one managed to get in. It really bothered me because I had a 2 week old baby and 2 dogs in the house. I reached out to Magic City and Taylor came out the first thing the Next Morning! He tackled the nest outside and discovered one in out attic as well. This was 4 weeks ago and I haven't seen a wasp since! And it's prime pollen season.

Did I mention that the products are natural so I didn't even have to evacuate my newborn or the dogs?

Reasonably priced, excellent customer service, effective products and quick responsiveness. What more could you ask for? I highly recommend you do yourself a favor and give them a call. Magic City will take great care of you!

resp.text: Brittani, thank you for leaving us such a sweet review! We appreciate your business and are grateful to work with y’all!

name: Pat Brandenberg
text: I would recommend Magic City Pest Control above anyone! The guys were on time, very courteous, polite and did a great job! I had began to see cockroaches over the last couple of months. I read their reviews and decided to give them a call. One day after they had treated my house I was already seeing a big improvement. I'm barely seeing any bugs already! They are coming back in a month to treat again but they require no contract and this time of the Corona Virus it meant a lot to me. Knowing that people who have hardly any income can call on Magic City Pest Control to help them rid their bug and mice problems without worrying about a month to month payment. They also had on masks when they knocked on my door! I truly commend the gentleman and the work ethics of Magic City Pest Control! They get my 5 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐'s!

text: On July 25, 2019 and July 31, 2019, I called Lewis Pest Control office in Demopolis, AL because I had a problem with one of their technicians that did a termite inspection at my home on July, 24, 2019. That was a week ago. I have not received a call from the manager to discuss my issue yet.  I have two properties that are serviced quarterly as well as termite contract. I guess my issue is not important enough to get a returned call. I am definitely going to look for some other company who cares about their customers to return calls from them. I don't have to beg and pay them too.

text: Bama Exterminating did general, quarterly exterior spraying for pest control at my house for many years.  I thought it was a good price for the service.  The only roaches I ever saw were dead. They taught me to identify a brown recluse spider and gave me glue traps for mice.  They were always respectful.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 star review and kind words, Kim! We are thrilled to know that you had an incredible experience with our team and you're seeing great results! Our goal is to make pest control as simple as possible for our customers because we understand how busy life can be. We appreciate your business. Thank you for choosing Bama Exterminating! Please don't hesitate to let us know if we can be of service.

Salton from Bama exterminating knocked on the door today and I asked him to come inside since it was so hot.
I had my inspector Gadget magnifing glass trying to find the heating instructions for a  tv dinner. Dalton help me find the instuctions and even programmed the microwave oven.
3 years ago i had a stroke that left me almost blind.  Dalton's Kindness and willingness to help made my day.  Bama Exterminating is a top shelf business with top shelf employees. Call them today for all your exterminating needs.

resp.text: Hi Steve, thank you so much for the 5-Star review! Dalton does a great job and is always thorough, professional, friendly, and helpful. We love knowing that you had an A+++ experience! From everyone at Bama we are sorry to hear that you had a stoke and please let us know if you ever need anything! We appreciate your business and the feedback!

text:
It would be nice if they would call me to let me know when they were coming to do the services.

Updated
Today I received a call from someone about my review and the concerns that I have.
They are supposed to call and set up my appointment in the future.

resp.text:
Hello Milton, we apologize for the experience you had with on of our team members. We strive to always provide our customers with prompt and professional service. This is not typical of us and can assure you it will not happen again.

We want you to know that we've used your experience within our customer satisfaction process to be sure we don't make this mistake again.

We’ll be reaching out to you personally in the next 24 hours to touch bases. We want to learn more about what happened and how we can make things right.

Rachel Hunter
Marketing & Business Development
Bama Exterminating

text: We signed up for quarterly pest control because the house already had an existing termite contract with them. After the first spray, we kept getting earwigs (like 1 a day) inside the house (half of the time they were very much alive). We called and they sprayed again. It didn't stop the earwigs. Second spraying comes around and same thing- earwigs inside every day. This time when we contacted them (2 weeks ago), they ignored us. They also didn't call when they came to spray the second time so if hadn't been home, he wouldn't have been able to get inside or in the backyard. We signed a year contract and I'm not sure what it would take to get out of that. But signing a contract should have been a signal they were bad. Good results don't require a contract to keep people stuck. Be aware of the contact too- it only covers a very limited amount of pests.

name: Catherine Lee
text: My roommate and I had a terrible experience with this company. To start, the employee sprayed the wrong house the first time we made an appointment. This was very inconvenient for my roommate and I to figure out another time to have the guy come spray our house. Once we got home after finally having our house sprayed, we noticed some of our belongings had been gone through. There was jewelry rearranged, purses opened, and a ring was lying in the hallway by the kitchen. We were very confused because the only person who had been in our house that day was the exterminator. We looked through our belongings and came to find that a Michael Kors watch was missing (est. $225), Apple T.V (est. $100+),  jewelry (est. $600+), and cash. We are not explicitly accusing anyone of stealing, but we have high suspicions because the exterminator was the only one in the house that day. Keep in mind that it was required for everyone in the house to evacuate during the spraying procedure. We are extremely violated and hope this does not happen to anyone else.

text: My experience with Bama has been very good.  The people sent to our home have been prompt, professional, courteous and helpful.  We have been pleased with the service.

name: Pam Sewell
text:
We have used Bama for about 15 years (in 3 different houses).  Nice techs that come to my house. Have rarely seen a live "bug" inside the house - but if I do and it's not time for the next quarterly service, I call them and they come out and re-spray at no charge.
We recently moved (about 4 months ago) and, though, still in a neighborhood, this time our house backs up to woods instead of a neighbor's house.  We had ticks and "critters" in the yard everywhere! - some I had never seen before in my life! Carly came and did a TOTAL inside and outside spray (the entire yard!) before we started the quarterly service at this house.  Bugs and ticks are GONE! Wheee!  I still see an occasional 'millipede' (sp?) but I think as we continue the quarterly service, they will disappear too (they are rough ole hard-shelled critters!). 4 Thumbs Up! ;-)

name: Alex Seiver
text: I had an absolutely fantastic experience with Bama Exterminating Co. - the team that came do perform the termite protection on my home were punctual, friendly, courteous, professional, and above all, did a great job! I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Bama Exterminating to anyone looking for pest and termite protection.

name: Britt Marshall
text: Have been using their services for many years.  Have always been extremely happy with their thoroughness, their hospitality and their professionalism.  If you are in need of termite bond or pest control services, you should use them.

name: Delmar Thomas
text:
I had Bama Exterminating for a few years until I ran into some problems with them being sloppy.  I live out of state, but used them for my second home in AL.  I specifically asked them from the beginning to put my primary out-of-state home address as the billing contact.  For years, they would conduct the service and send the bill to my primary address out of state.  I always immediately paid for their services via credit card over the phone.  For my annual ant and terminate inspections this year, I just happen to call them to schedule things, and they said, "we closed your account because of failure to make a payment."  ???  I told them I never received a bill nor knew there was an outstanding balance.  I asked what the billing address was...never got a straight answer.  Eventually, the phone representative admitted to the possibility that Bama may have sent it to the AL home where the service was being performed.  Also not true, because my mom lives there and sends me all bills that come to the house.  The phone rep even had the nerve to say "we were sending the account to collections."  I never even knew there was a bill due!  And they obviously make no attempts on their end to keep in touch with the customer.  That was issue No. 1.  Nonetheless, I immediately paid the outstanding balance and that issue was resolved, despite Bama's sloppiness and failure to communicate.

Issue No 2., they have an absolutely unconscionable provision in their agreement that says something to the effect of, "Customer must give 30 days written notice before getting out the the Agreement."  The very next sentence in the Agreement says, "Bama may cancel the contact without notice at any time for any reason."  What?!

Besides the fact that such a provision would never hold up in court if there ever were a dispute, it is a completely onerous clause.  They're not selling gold, they spraying chemicals on the ground, for goodness sake.  No need for such an unfair clause.  I asked the representative for a reason for such an unfair clause.  She responded something to the effect of, "we need that in there for customers who don't pay."  What????  Well, in my opinion, such language is waaaay over broad for such a limited scenario as nonpayment.  Anyway, I refused to agree to it, Bama Exterminating refused to change or delete it, and we parted ways.  I signed up the same day with their competitor, who actually ended up being cheaper...and more organized as well.  I have been happy so far.

There is a fine line between a mom and pop operation and a sloppy operation.

text: Wont use bama exterminators again. They are liars. Say one thing and do another.

We aim to provide superior pest control services to our clients and to always be upfront about all aspects of our business and services. To ensure we are maintaining this level of superior service we keep very detailed records of all interactions with our team. We will review your account and reach out to you if any additional information is needed to resolve this matter. Please feel free to call us anytime you have questions.

In our newer home, on a slab, we thought we could go without pest control, but learned quickly that if you don't do SOMEthing to prevent them, those little brown yuckthings WILL come in your home. No matter how clean you are. So we called Bama back and have been satisfied (and bug-free) customers ever since!

text: Courteous and professional, not to mention prompt.  Service was excellent.

name: Dr. Lindsay Greenlee
text:
This company is unprofessional and their customer service is severely lacking.  In my case, they made several mistakes and refused to admit to or even rectify their own mistakes.  I purchased my home four years ago and it came with a termite bond with Bama Exterminating.  This year (2014) they mailed me a contract to sign regarding that termite bond with dates listed from 2012 to 2014.  In essence, because they made a mistake and did not have me sign a contract when I purchased the home, they were trying to get me to agree to terms for the previous years to cover themselves legally while disregarding the legal issues for the customer.
I called their office manager, Kim Ousley, to inquire about this contract and she was unable to explain why I was receiving this contract four years after the home purchase and why the contract had a start date listed as 2012.  After getting frustrated with my questioning and being unable to answer the questions posed to her, she hung up the phone.
Then, I spoke with another employee, Mr. Bridges, who did manage to explain at least why I was receiving this contract at the time I did.  However, he did not see any issue with me agreeing to terms, in writing, that were two years in the past.  He also did not see any issue with Ms. Ousley's behavior even though she was unable to explain their contract and hung up on a customer after getting flustered.
So, there are a serious of problems here that are all the mistake of Bama Exterminating and the company refused to rectify their mistake.  First, they should obtain a new contract when homes are sold for the new owner.  They failed to do that in my case.  When they realized their mistake (in 2012), they continued to let the contract go unsigned.  In 2014, they mailed a letter and a contract dated for 2012.  In the letter they stated they could not renew my termite bond UNLESS I signed the back-dated contract.  This seems reasonable except the mistake was on their end and I shouldn't be required to sign things I am uncomfortable signing and they refused to fix it.  I offered to sign a current contract but they would not do that unless I signed the back-dated one.  Finally, the way the office manager, Ms. Ousley, handled the call was unfortunate.  If she did not have the proper information or could not communicate effectively with the customer, she should have found someone else to help rather than hang up the phone on a long-term customer.
In sum, there were multiple errors made this company and even after I offered to sign a current contract, they refused to fix their mistake or even take responsibility.  I would not recommend doing business with this company until they refine their business practices.  There are many more companies that offer the same type of services and will offer better customer service.

***Update - I hired their competitor for half the cost yearly and I would suggest doing that.  From what I have learned about pest control, Bama Exterminating is using older bait stations which is why they need to come service them four times a year.  Companies that use more modern equipment are lower cost because the stations need to be serviced less often.

name: Leonard Mccalpin
text:
I had Bohannon service my rental houses and personal homes for several years. I was very happy for several years.

The salesman who oversaw service for my homes moved to a different company.

Everything went down hill from there.

After the saleman left the service techs would not replace caps to the termite stations when they inspected quqrtely... and then when I called after most of them were missing, I was told they would charge me for each cap due to  more than 3 of caps missing at one time.

Seems trivial,... but if this the is the kind of service a person with multiple house under contract receives,..then you should be concerned about how they will treat you once they have you under contract.

The company is quilty of not replacing the caps during quarterly inspections just so they can charge for them when more than 3 are missing.  Sad way to nickel and dime a good paying customer.

That being said,  I am nott sure the technicians were doing anything except walking around my homes, and sending me bills for several years after the good salesman left.

I even spoke with the owner of Bohannon prior to dropping them from servicing every home I own,... she thought her company was completely correct to nickel and dime me for trivial items that would have been included if the service tech had replaced them one or two at a time during quarterly inspections.

I would highly recommend to anyone to select another pest control company instead of using Bohannon.

I was very unhappy at the time I stopped doing biz with Bohannon

resp.text:
Hi Mr. McCalpin,
We are truly sorry you were so dissatisfied with the termite protection we provided.  Our salesmen have no part in training or overseeing the employees, so any parallel between the salesman and technician was purely coincidental.  Part of the inspection process we provide includes replacing broken or missing top caps.  This is done at no charge to the customer.  The exception to this rule would be for the concrete core caps, which we will replace for free if the core caps were damaged due to any negligence by our company. However, if the homeowner is responsible for damaging the concrete core caps, we will replace them at cost.  The Sentricon top caps and bait tubes each contain a unique barcode, which is scanned in upon each service then subsequently downloaded onto our system each day, therefore ensuring each station was checked. We are happy to provide a record at your request.  Furthermore, checking the stations and doing proper inspections are a vital part of maintaining your termite protection, since we would be liable should infestation occur.  We appreciate the business you provided us.  If we can be of any further assistance, or answer any questions, please feel free to call our office at 256-764-2452, or send us an email at contactus@bohannonpestcontrol.com.

name: Megan Corry
text: Never pleased with our service, but only had the option to start with/ use a contract. They had a deal that was $100 off initial treatment at the time. We recently moved and my husband called to cancel services. He was told there would be no cancellation fee (we had 2 treatments left) 2 weeks later, he was told on the phone that we actually would owe the last 2 treatments because we were in the service area (this was not a condition before). We were also told if we cancelled, we would still owe the last 2 treatment amounts plus the $100 initial discount. The contract language is very vague about this... Will be contacting BBB in regards to this matter. Company has yet to send response to us. Instead, we received an automated email telling us when the next treatment was. Service was performed (saw him on security cameras), but the company never called to set up a time. This is very unacceptable.

When they came for the second 3 month scheduled spray, they told me they only do the outside of the house unless requested, so I asked him to spray our master bathroom since earwigs were randomly coming in. We saw an earwig in our bathroom the DAY AFTER the spray. We called them about these issues and they argued about their product instead of trying to solve the issue. We decided then to switch to a different company and haven't had an issue with spiders or anything since!! They have also flat out harassed, argued and even cursed at me since we discontinued their service because we refused to pay the final bill, considering the service/product did absolutely no good.

text:
Farmer's Pest Control is an exceptionally great company to work with. text: Not at all impressed. Got a quote from Cooks and another competitor. We decided to go with Cooks based off of a lower price. name: David Russell
text:
We had been with another, very popular, pest-control service for decades.  Even though we paid them boat-loads of money, they COULDN'T help us with a rodent problem.  This is a pest-control service that advertises regularly on local TV.  The spokesperson, who I think is now the owner, also treated my elderly, blind, widowed mom with *much* disrespect.

Once, back in the 80's, prior to having a termite contract, we had a termite swarm break out into one of our rooms.  It was *NIGHTMARISH!*  We had to cordon off that section of the house!  Since our pest contract was with this other service,  I called for help but they told me that they would get to me *eventually* in the next day or two.  When  I protested, they said this happens, that there wasn't much they could do about it and that I would just have to deal with it.

I put my foot down and they sent a team out that day, but can you imagine how they must have bullied some of their other customers?

COOK'S PEST CONTROL IS ***AWESOME*** !!!!!

They took care of our rodent problem IMMEDIATELY and with ease.  When I told them that this other service didn't even try to help us, their rep said that Cook's is a pest-control service and that rodents are pests, so he didn't see the disconnect.

I didn't either.

Cook's actually DOES WHAT YOU PAY THEM TO DO.  What a concept!  Their staff are *VERY* professional and oh-so-courteous.  They treat their customers with kindness and respect.  They always call before they come to service our property.  They always ask if we're having any problems and always address those problems right away.  Oh - and I can't stress this enough - they actually DO WHAT YOU PAY THEM TO DO!

Thank you, thank you, THANK YOU, Cook's!

resp.text: Thank YOU, David, for 5-star review and for being a loyal Cook's customer. We enjoyed reading about the experiences that led you to Cook's and, in contrast, we're glad you have been treated well by our team members. Please don't hesitate to share your positive experience with friends, neighbors and family members who may need a reliable pest control company.  Your complete satisfaction is our #1 priority at Cook's!

I love the speed. I could have canceled by now but figured why should I. They are still helping with bees and wasp. And ant season is coming in soon. Cook was a God send to me.

name: Brenda Brown
text: We have had pest control service from County Pest Control for a number of years.  Certainly think this is the best service around.  Last week I called telling them suddenly we had a sudden appearance of tiny black ants.  Had to leave a message, but within 10 minutes my call was returned. I explained my problems to Matthew Sanders, and he said he would be there shortly.  Within 30 minutes he arrived.  After an explanation of the possible cause, Matthew began treatment.  After treating the inside problem, he investigated the outside and did some spraying there.  ( This WAS NOT our regular quarterly treatment).  The Sanders family is knowledge, are always on time, and provide quality service at a reasonable price.  Thanks, County Pest Control!

text: I have been using them for several years and would not go without. Until I learn of this service I avoided my yard in the summer. But since I’m no longer a mosquito main course I can enjoy my yard year round. Love this company!

resp.text: Gail, your kind message means a great deal to us, and we appreciate you trusting us to assist you with these needed treatments. Keeping your yard mosquito-free is what we're here for and we love knowing you're able to continue to enjoy your yard. Thank you!

name: Lindsey Jackson
text:
I started using MA for mosquito control and this is the first summer I’ve been able to use my backyard and not be eaten alive! They’re awesome communication wise- they text a day ahead of time letting you know they’re coming and they call the morning of to remind you. Their customer service is fantastic. Every time I’ve called in I’ve had a positive experience. They are accommodating with rescheduling. And they’re serious about their guarantee- one time I had a friend get bit up (it was after weeks of non stop rain so makes sense) and I called them the next day and they came and sprayed the next day!!

I like their service so much I switched my pest control to them after talking to one of their techs one day about their pest services. That day- before I was even “officially” signed up- he helped me out by spraying and plugging a hole where carpenter bees where burrowing. They go above and beyond to ensure customers have a good experience!

name: Barbara Kenyon
text: We LOVE Mosquito Authority! The service is exceptional and we’re always so pleased with the results! With all the rain we’ve had, the mosquitoes have been really bad but never too much for Mosquito Authority. One call and they’re back out the very next day to spray again & protect us from those awful insects! Mac, our technician is always so friendly and pays extra close attention when spraying - especially the trouble areas (bird bath, standing water, etc,) to ensure my family & I can enjoy being outdoors without the little pests biting us. He’s awesome & always super professional. And Caroline - the sweetest voice of Mosquito Authority - makes it all happen for MA! I don’t know how she juggles it all! She continues to provide the best customer service - she always exceeds my expectations. I started with Mosquito Authority 8 years ago and I will continue to stick with them because they are not only the BEST IN THE INDUSTRY but the are like FAMILY to me! Big big thanks to the Mosquito Authority Team! Y’all are awesome!

resp.text: Barbara, we are truly fortunate to have you as a valued customer! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful comments and feedback here, online. Our team is always happy to assist with keeping your property clear of mosquitoes and other pets! We appreciate you, immensely!

name: Karen Boyd
text: We’ve been using Mosquito Authority for several years now.  We’ve been pleased.   They are very good to come back if need be!    And best of all, no mosquitoes!

resp.text: Karen, we are deeply proud to provide an incredible and consistently effective service to our valued customers! Thank you for sharing your online support with our team!

He didn’t have to do that but I appreciate it I have grandchildren and dogs that are always in the yard. Thank you again!!

resp.text: Lillian, our team appreciates the kind remarks you have shared, and it has been a pleasure treating your properties these past seasons!

name: Crys. Worley
text:
I’ve used mosquito authority for quite a few years now. There is a dramatic difference in the amount of mosquitos on our property if I’m a month late getting MA back around to spray after winter. We add the tick package as well and have not had issues with our animals bringing in ticks this year.

I request they email the day before to let us know they’re expected to come and text when they’re on their way bc we have 2 large dogs that need to be put up. They always follow the requests so their process is fast and efficient.

Our next door neighbors do not get their yards sprayed and we have not had any mosquitos from their property lingering into ours. I think having ours sprayed probably helps them actually. I thought that would be an issue but it’s not. I’m happy enough with the service to be a customer since 2015 or so.

resp.text: We're always thrilled to hear when our customers are able to see a difference immediately! Thank you for being a valued customer for the past few seasons, as we are pleased to provide effective and prompt service and treatments, when you need them!

text: We have just started using TruGreen and so far are very satisfied with their services. name: Dave Mac
text: TruGreen is a great company.  Mike was our tech. Very  professional and very knowledgeable.

name: John Moses
text: These professionals performed my weed control swiftly and competently.

name: C. Kent Riley, DMD
text: We decided to try TruGreen of Mobile about a year ago, and initially the service seemed to be marginally effective at weed control, fertilizing, and pest control.  However, over time, we noticed the results became less & less apparent, and the invoices seemed to become higher & higher.  Then, finally at some point last winter, there was some apparent weed spraying along my property’s entire fenceline that left behind a 3-foot wide swath of dead grass, which became painfully obvious when the lawn came out of its winter dormancy in late March 2021.  All TruGreen tech had to say was that it must’ve been from a cold winter & some other BS, and that maybe it would eventually grow back; however, none of our many other neighbors that don’t use TruGreen, but do have the same type of centipede grass, the same type of shadow box fence, and the same type of winter weather showed no signs of this kind of problem.  So, I have to call B.S. on this lame-brain & accept-no-responsibility explanation.  TruGreen management was notified numerous times about this complaint, and we never got a reply from anyone about it.  Needless to say, we were forced to cancel this expensive & negative impact lawn service.  Now, I have the wonderful task of ripping-up thousands of square feet of dead grass along my entire fenceline, and purchasing expensive & dirty sod to put it all back myself.  Then, I have the wonderful task of watering it all back to health very early in the morning for the next several weeks.  Thanks TruGreen! 👏

name: Sheila Dear more
text: We have used them for 2 years. The last couple of visit we have seen no reductions in weeds and stickers. Called and they sent someone to spot treat areas, still no results. Called and spoke with manager named Brandon, he was suppose to come out Weds to take a look, never showed or called.  Waited a day still no show or call.  I also referred to co workers months ago and never received referral discount. Have canceled service and will be going with another company.

name: William Barton
text: I originally contracted with TruGreen via the lawn service I used  at the time.  I've recently switched to being a regular direct customer.  The switch over was quick and painless.  The office staff was very helpful and efficient.  The technicians that provide my treatments are likewise professional and the results are outstanding.

name: Charles Owen
text: After the last treatments by trugreen, my yard was worse than the prior year. Grassy weeds all over the place. Called them to fix things. They treated the yard again and the weeds persist. I had to order weed killer and treat most of my yard.

resp.text: Mr. Owen, I am having trouble locating you in our system at the Mobile, AL location. I do apologize that your service with TruGreen was not up to your satisfaction. You can give us a call at our office 251-653-3242 & we would love to help you resolve your issues. Thank you, The Owners

text: Doesn't give accurate information

I’ve since fertilized myself and it looks better, I’ll be doing soil sampling etc to understand better what’s going on. In short, I’m not sure what I was paying them for, very disappointing, they take your money, but very poor value in my experience. Note they said they would come  by and look at the lawn after I left them, they never followed up.

name: Sarah DeShong
text: We downsized and wanted less yard work , smaller flower beds, etc.  We found exactly that.  However, keeping our smaller lawn healthy-a beautiful carpet of thick green grass-free of weeds, insects/applying fertilizer, nutrients...still took a lot of work .  We decided to call TruGreen. Was one of the the smartest things we ever did!  They are experts in lawn care & do a wonderful job.  In fact, neighbors began asking what we were doing -told them to call TruGreen and now they have lawns to be proud of too.  They provide services according to your individual needs and budget!!  You don’t have to be at home- they leave you a TruGreen tag on your door stating what they did.  AND, if you need them or have a concern, just a quick call and it’s handled.  TruGreen has maintained our lawn for 4 years... we know how great they are!!  We look forward to weekends now..NO YARD WORK... more time with family & friends ..THANKS to TRU-GREEN!!

text: Cody did a fabulous job for us. He took his time and sprayed for weeds in my lawn especially around the edges of my flower beds. Other companies have told me they cant get this close but he did. My lawn as a whole looks great and I'm glad Cody is my regular lawn guy.

name: Boccadoro Narciso
text: They are not worth inviting to your lawn. After paying fully for their crappy first service, I have discontinued them and  they have the gall to bill me $20 for backing the "discount" from that payement. DO NOT SIGN CONTRACT! THERE ARE MANY SERVICES IN THE AREA THAT ARE GOOD, HONEST AND RELIABLE!  response to the owner, I did not disclose my real name as I do not trust you, in fact i just received another mail with the demand of $20. NEVER AGAIN!

resp.text: Mr. Narcisco, I am having difficulty locating you as a customer in our system. We  actually do not have one TruGreen customer that signs a contract as we are non contractual, and have been for all of our 18 years of business. We have no signatures, no cancellation fess, and no binding agreements for our service. We assure you that we run our business with the utmost integrity, and I am sorry that you did not feel you experienced that. As I stated before, I am unable to locate your account in my system or I would be glad to look into this for you.

text: Professional, friendly and helpful staff. Did an exceptional job on the first treatment of my lawn.

name: mcqueen family
text: Great customer service and adorable prices

name: Winston Miller
text: They discovered the PH of my lawn was off and they have worked hard to get it to the desired PH. I have received a lot of comments about how good my grass looks since they started all of their various treatments. I think they saved me from needing to put down new sod.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind comments Mr Miller. Ill pass that along to our team. Keep in mind that we offer $30 referrals if you want to recommend us to the neighbors who like your lawn.

name: Paul Geene
text: Great service! From the ladies in the office,to our technition,Randy, in the field,we receive the highest level of both professional and personal attention as promised. They understand positive interaction with a customer, sadly a lost art today.  Thank you,again.  Paul and Michelle

name: Danny Phillips
text: As our lawn began to green up this spring it was looking really good...until Trugreen has started their "treatment".  Now the backyard has large dead spots, and there are large yellow and dead spots in the front.  We now have the worst yard in our neighborhood-far worse than our neighbors who don't do anything to their yard, except for our next door neighbors who use them, too, and whose yard is almost as bad as ours.

resp.text: Mr. Phillips, I am having a problem locating your account in our system. Is it perhaps under a different name? Our goal is 100% satisfaction, and we assure you that we will always go the extra mile to ensure it. With our yearly lawn program we offer free service calls to our customers, so that if you are ever experiencing any issues with your lawn we can send a trained technician to your home for free to ensure that your problem is taken care of promptly. We did experience a particularly harsh winter this year, so winter injury is more prevalent than usual but we strongly believe in our product and our technicians ability to combat it. Please give us a call at the office  at your convenience so we can discuss this further and develop a plan of action.

name: John Mickler
text: TruGreen is courteous and professional on every visit.  I feel like I getting a good value for my money.

name: Debra Hibbert
text: Always friendly and professional  with the added benefit of giving me suggestions on how to improve my lawn.

name: Brenda Taylor
text: They treated my yard and my neighbors last year with NO improved results. I ask to speak to the manager. Sent them pictures of my yard afterwards and still almost a year later no response. This year my yard looks terrible. Will have to figure something else out. Can’t  trust these people. They really DONT CARE!!!

resp.text: Ms Taylor, I am sorry you didn't get the results you expected. I wish you would have stuck with our agronomic plan. My records show that you only took 2 treatments early in 2018 and your neighbor took only one application. With our rainfall plus weed & pest pressure we have found it takes treatments throughout the year and not just once or twice in the spring to eliminate weeds and correct problems that have existed for years. I am also sorry your lawn looks terrible this year. Hopefully you continued to care for it after you stopped our service almost 12 months ago.

name: Bob & Carolyn
text: They are prompt and courteous.  Whenever it looks like my lawn has a problem, weeds, et cetera, I call and they are right on the spot taking care of it.  I appreciate them very much.

name: *Chevy Meg*
text: Rian was amazing and super sweet! She helped me make my yard so green!!!! I would highly recommend

resp.text: We appreciate your business, thank you!

name: Christina Rollo
text: Fantastic service, always friendly & knowledgeable! Exactly what you want in a Lawn Care service!

name: Catherine McCaslin
text: No fuss. They do all the work and apply everything at the right times. I do not have to call and get things corrected because they have already identified the problem and are working on it.

resp.text: Thank you Catherine!  That is our goal. It is hard to hit that goal sometimes in Horticulture since we are dealing with the environment so thank you for sharing your experience.

name: Paula Thornhill
text: Great  people to work with!  Very knowledgeable and dependable!

text: I have dealt with TruGreen for years and have been extremely satisfied with their service and the way my lawn looks. Thank you

text: These guys have done a fantastic job on my lawn for years and are always professional and courteous! Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Ms. Brown.

name: Nicole Barker
text: This company offered a discount for services if I would put my card on file.  Came and did the services but Then charged my card the full amount. Which is fine accidents happen. When I called back to have them fix it the first time they said it would be handled they saw the mistake. I waited a week for the credit to go back which it never did.  Then when I called back the second time the lady was so rude and unwilling to give me the credit but offered to try and discount it on next times services   Agreed that it should not of been charged that way but not helpful in getting it credited.  So now I have to dispute with my credit card.  I clearly would not recommend this company to anyone.

resp.text: Ms Baker I'm sorry for the confusion but you were to receive a $20.00 discount for signing up for our auto charge billing option and agreeing to our yearly program. You did not want to continue with our program, which is fine, but you cant quit the program and still receive the discount. This was explained to you and is printed on every marketing piece we use. I'm sorry again for the confusion.

name: Riland Jones
text: Ok at first, then they started charging me randomly during the month for services without ok. I ended my service 2 years ago and I have begged them to stop calling me, put me on a no call list and I still get calls. Will not recommend to anyone

resp.text: Mr Jones I am afraid you may have our South Alabama location confused with another TruGreen. I attempted to look up your account and we have no record of you ever being a customer. We are a small family franchise and my wife and I are the owners. We never charge customers without their approval and for that matter never call customers ever unless it is to schedule a requested service. Please give our office a call @ 251.653.3242 if you would so we can find the TruGreen location you were working with and help you reach out to them to resolve any issues you may have.  Sincerely, Randy McQueen Owner/Manager

text: Great lawn service. Couldn't ask for any better.

text: If you want a dead lawn, call these guys! I have used them for years in other states. These jokers are ridiculous!!!

We are both Degreed Horticulturists, Volunteer our time and resources to spreading Horticulture to Schools and Senior Centers and Donate to help provide landscapes for Habitat for Humanity. name: P Gypsy
text: I love my service from Orkin and all of my pests have been controlled very well. I might see an odd bug once and a while but it's very rare, and I only have them do the outside 90% of the time. Very few spiders outside and they alway knock down any webs to keep the place clean. They take care of any wasp nests as well. They also placed a mouse control box that has worked 100%. My service is every other month, but if I have a problem with anything they will come back as often as I need them at no extra cost. I have never considered changing to another company. The reason I only gave them 3 stars is because of their high employee turnover rate. I have been using them for 6 years now and my first technician stayed the longest. I believe he came 4 or 5 times. Since then I may only see the same person once or twice. The last one came a few days ago and that was the second time I have seen her. I am keeping my fingers crossed that she stays because she is GREAT! I wish I could remember her name because I want to call Orkin and personally ask them to keep her. Even though they take care of me well, a high turnover rate says a lot about how a company takes care of their employees.

resp.text: Thank you for your review of our company and our technician Amy.  Amy will be your technician going forward.  It is our aim to provide our customers with a consistent face as this builds a bond with our customers and it is beneficial for our company.  We are working hard as a company to prevent turnover but in today's environment this is becoming increasingly difficult.  Thank you for being loyal and patience with us during this time. text:
We'd tried raid, black flag, and straight bleach, but nothing worked until we found yellow jacket.

I am highly allergic to fleas. I was literally wearing socks long sweats gloves and a facemask to keep myself protected from the bites. I informed them of how serious it was and they responded immediately. They came right out the very next day at 8 am and sprayed the house. We put our animals in the car with us and we all waited to go back inside.

I haven't seen a flea since and it's been over a month. Yellow Jacket is the real deal and I CANNOT reccommend them highly enough!!!!

text: SPECTRUM IS THE BEST! I have had a recluse spider infestation in my apartment since move in (july) and management was slow to fix the problem properly. I have an infant in the home, which made the situation more of a concern. name: Carrie Walker
text:
I recieved a grant for insulation and these were the guys who came to do it. There is a lot to tell so maybe i can get through it all.
One of the guys made rude and unnecessary comments to my underage daughter, another walked in the bathroom on her and didnt knock. Those are enough to leave a bad review,  but let's get to the actual work.
They told me I didnt hve to move anything, but sprayed insulation lll over my bed, furniture, and all of my clothing, not once but 3 days in a row.
They cut through a water pipe in my upstairs (when they cut holes in the floor to insulate the layer between the up and downstairs) and they just capped it off leaving no running water to the upstairs kitchen or bathroom. They threw about a gallon size jug of nails all over my driveway which I found with 3 tires that I had to replace.
They were supposed to put storm windows on, caulk, and seal all air leaks. Instead of storm windows in several locations, they screwed plexiglass over the whole thing which happens to be a fire hazard, not to mention unsafe if my daughter ever has to get out of her window in an emergency. They also cut the power to one of the plugs in my kitchen and never fixed it either.
I never knew what was happening because there was a lack of communication between the office, the crew, and myself. Oh, they were supposed to come back and install a new backdoor but they never did that either, and I'm okay with that considering everything they messed up and didnt fix.

name: Taylor H
text: One of the worst companies I have ever dealt with. House was termite bonded through Sprays when I purchased. The technician came out a couple of times, inspected the house, presented paper work, took credit card information, and said he would take care of the rest with the office. One year later I never heard about paying the renewal few which was ~$200. Well come to find out the technician never turned in the paper work, left the company, and my house was no longer bonded so they wanted me to pay $1,000+ and a new yearly fee. Spoke with MR. SPRAY himself who said he would make it right, but instead gave me a bunch of sales garbage and how he really is a good guy blah blah blah. HE STILL WANTED THE $1000+. What a con company, even if one of the other places charge a little higher for the yearly fees it is 100% worth the money.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Collins!

name: Colleen Wilger
text: If I could give this company a zero I would.  Please stay far away if you want an honest assessment and accountability. I will explain the events and you can judge for yourself.  The experience started off quite well, Christian was quick to come out for a consult, where he made the assessment that flying squirrels were the cause of our attic sound.  He then proceeded to hand my husband a contract for $2400 without explaining charges.  My husband questioned the cost and he quickly removed the multi year warranty which lowered the price to $1400. He was then told it would be a week before any exclusion work would be done.  He agreed and waited. The company placed barriers on roof and a one way door to allow squirrels to leave on their own (work happened on a Tuesday).  So we waited some more.  The next Monday.  A week later we were still continuing to hear the SAME noise.  I called the company (twice) before someone named Greg came out to do a check.  He only checked the roof and not the interior of the attic where the sound was, said everything looked good and was working correctly.  We voiced our concerns and he said sometimes they take 3 weeks to leave but that there is a possibility that since the excrement looks similar it could be mice instead but if that was the case it would require a different company. He said they could set traps but would just wait until the follow up the following week. Mind you the amount you pay up front is not refundable AT ALL. so that Monday night once again we hear the noise (2 weeks into the process now and the sound is right above the master bedroom so two weeks with no sleep).  The next day I go to Home Depot and get traps myself.  Place the traps after work (about 7pm) and by 10 pm the have a heart had caught something! But to our surprise.  It was not a squirrel but a mouse.  We release it the next day and reset the trap as well as two old school back cracker style traps, the next morning we’ve caught another.  Still no squirrels.  I call the company obviously irritated (once again takes two calls to get a call back). Greg calls back and is super defensive won’t admit there is a chance that they did not assess the full situation correctly (house was built in the 70’s so sure maybe there was a chance there was old poop up there from something else).  Once again extremely defensive, belittling, opposite of good customer service.  Says he is the boss there is no one above him to discuss my concerns with.  They are currently still supposed to come do a recheck and spray some sort of an enzyme mix to stop squirrels from coming back (that we’ve already paid for at this point) but if Squirrels were not the problem what good is that?? I think even an admission that the initial assessment could have been wrong would have gone a long way but no.  they basically said there is no way to prove that squirrels didn’t leave...even though the sound is still present so the situation is obviously not resolved oh and the icing on the cake, the company does not trap mice.  If your in the Vestavia, AL area please pick a different company if you don’t know for sure the specific animal you have a problem with because this company will be honest upfront.  If Christian had told my husband..look here is what I think but there is a chance 50/50, 75/25 whatever you want to call it that this won’t work to solve your problem because you may have a different problem or two problems...then we would be looking at a different review.  I’m not unreasonable I just expect accountability.  I still have a phone call in to someone at a higher level at the company hoping for some answers  or resolution before taking further action but my hopes are not high.   Best thing I can do is to warn my fellow neighbors and friends.

resp.text:
Mrs. Wilger,

We appreciate your review although there needs to be some clarification. Your attic did have signs of squirrels. We do not make guarantees that wildlife will be removed within a specific time period and your complaints about still hearing noises happened while we were not yet entirely completed with the service. Wildlife are unpredictable and one week is not enough time to know if our service is working or not. We completed all of the repairs per the schedule and we have to let our systems run their course. Thank you again for your business and we look forward to resolving your issue.

text: We had a great experience with Conserv. We had bats in the attic and had Dallas come out who showed us where they were getting in. They sealed the openings and removed the bats. Very professional company to deal with.

text: Please do not waste your time.  We payed for conserve to perform a job, but it took them 3 weeks to send someone out that did not have the equipment to perform the job. The only thing that was done  was spraying the roof with a substance.  This was a horrible experience and I will contact the BBB.

text: Found we had bats roosting on our gable vent when we were taking down Christmas decorations from the attic so we called Conserv. Kyle came out same day and looked over the entire home. Kayla,

name: Keekay Lomo
text:
Please stay away from this
company. They damaged my celing during an inspection and still have not fixed it. They had us pay for the squirrel removal and seal and 2weeks later they still haven't shown up to do the job.

Response from the owner a day ago

Mrs. Akinsanya, The job was scheduled for 9/24/19 as agreed upon when the contract was executed. All work was completed then. As soon as we found out about the damaged ceiling, we informed you that we would get that fixed as soon as we know all of the squirrels have been removed to decrease the risk of live squirrels getting into into the living space of the house. We greatly appreciate the opportunity to serve you.

I'm sorry but you have the wrong information. When Richard came to our home on 9/6/19 to pick up the check and contract he said we would receive a call on 9/9/19 to schedule because the service had to be paid in advance before the job could be scheduled. Which we never did receive a call so my husband called on Tuesday and we were scheduled for 9/19/19 between 8-1. We tried to cancel because that seemed too far out to allow the squirrel to remain in our home to keep causing damage, but we were quickly reminded of the No Refund Policy. At 12:30 on 9/19 we received a call saying no one would be able to come do the job that day because of a delay in his schedule (eventhough we had rearranged our schedule to make sure someone would be at home) and that he had to come on Sunday morning 9/22/19.
You may want to retrain your staff to give complete information upfront   and double check your information before responding.
Thank you!

Update: It's September 2020 and they won't answer our calls and still have not fixed our ceiling!
Stay away from these scammers!

resp.text:
Mrs. Akinsanya,

The job was scheduled for 9/24/19 as agreed upon when the contract was executed. All work was completed then.

As soon as we found out about the damaged ceiling, we informed you that we would get that fixed as soon as we know all of the squirrels have been removed to decrease the risk of live squirrels getting into into the living space of the house.

We greatly appreciate the opportunity to serve you.

Thank You

name: Louise McClenndon
text: Austin was very informative about wildlife and I'm very happy with the results.

name: Geedy Dorman
text: Thought I had a issue with a rat in the wall of my home.  Called Conserve Wildlife Removal and they sent Brice McClendon out this afternoon.  Before he came I found the entry point and was able to seal it.  When Brice came out he discussed some possibilities then conducted a through inspection of the outside as well as all through the attic.  He provided recommendations for repairs and stated he would follow up in the next couple of days.  Very pleased with the service he provided and recommend him if you  believe you have issues.

name: Jane Underwood
text: We can't say enough about the great service we have received from Conserv & their technician, Bryce.  We have had an ongoing battle with squirrels.  We called Conserv & they responded very quickly & professionally.  The squirrels are quite persistent & each time I have contacted Bryce he has responded as quickly as possible & has done a great job of communicating & keeping us apprised  of what he is doing.  He is extremely professional, knowledgeable & friendly.  He is a great ambassador for the company.  Highly recommend Conserv for pest issues!

resp.text:
Mrs. Underwood, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We greatly appreciate your business. Thank You!
Kyle Waltz, President

name: Hal McHale
text: Daxton and team executed a plan precisely to rid us of flying squirrels. Besides removing the wildlife from our attic, he was very respectful and a pleasure to work with.

name: Julie Ray
text: Got here quick and got the job done. Very professional! Thanks Christian.

name: Ludmila Williams
text: This is my first negative review and I hate having to do it but I contacted these people because of all the good reviews. I have 2 townhomes, a little Bat had started visiting one of my porches, we tried everything and the little thing kept coming back. I called Conserv and asked if they could do anything to get rid of the bat, they said they would have someone call me to come out. Daxton called and came out a few days later, my husband met him and Daxton recommend to have both homes sprayed so we did. It cost $189, which we were good with if it meant the Bat would leave. The next day a different Bat showed up so my husband called Daxton directly (which he said we could do) and he said he would come out and see. Never heard from him again. My husband and I have call every week since July 3rd and every time we get “I’ll get someone to call you back”. I was not looking for a refund AT ALL I just want the Bats gone. Ever since we had the houses sprayed we now have 2 different bats that come every night. I just wish they would be honest with me and say there is nothing they can do instead of giving me the run around. Pretty disappointed with my experience. I guess I will stop trying at this point and just count my losses.

resp.text:
Good Afternoon Mrs. Ludmila,

We really appreciate the review.

We took a deep look into our phone records and your account information and here is what we found.

Phone records show Greg did return your calls. There wasn’t a single call that went unreturned. We are not sure what the confusion was here, but am deeply sorry for any miscommunication.

Service agreements you signed indicate you purchased a one time deterrent application to the exterior of your home to deter the bat that was showing itself on the exterior. The service clarified that there is no guarantee because the bat can’t legally be relocated and we can’t control a bat flying outside or landing on your home on the outside. Because the bat was only on the outside of the house and did not enter the structure, there is nothing more that can be done to deter the bat.

We would be happy to come by to take a second look at no charge.

Thank You,

Management

name: Ryan Baldwin
text:
I contacted the company in late May to help with a squirrel issue. The Tech arrived and found the entry point that the squirrel was using to get in the attic. I was then informed that they could put up something to allow the squirrels to get out, but not get back in. I agreed to their charge of $399 to perform the service and the tech said that he would be back the following week to complete the task.

On the following Wednesday, I received a message that the tech had been let go from the company and to call the office to reschedule the appointment. I called back and they were unable to send anyone out to complete the task in a reasonable time frame, so I informed them to refund my money and I would handle the issue myself. I was informed that they could not issue a refund, so I asked to speak to a manager.

The following day, I spoke to Rick(VP of Ops) and was informed that I should have my refund in the next couple days. I checked a week later and still no refund. I then called Rick back and he apologized and told me that he would ensure the refund was made and would be in my account in the next few days. Again, no refund after a week. I then called Rick again and received no answer, so I followed up with the office(Birmingham) and was told that Rick was no longer with the company. Surprise, Surprise.

Fast forward, I've spoken to multiple people about the refund and they have sworn that I will be getting it. I hate to say that it has now been 3 months since my first scheduled appointment with this company and still nothing has been done to resolve my issue.

If I were you, I'd look for someone else to do your wildlife removal.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update-9/9/2018

Even though the owner has commented that a refund was processed, it is over a week later and there is still no refund.

Kyle-Where is my refund?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update-9/13/2018

Got my refund.

resp.text:
Mr. Baldwin,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are very sorry that your experience was not pleasant. A refund has been sent for processing.

Sincerely,

Kyle Waltz, President

name: Mary Ann Meadows
text: This company practices fraud!  Don’t walk!  RUN!  They are deceptive and charge for no work.  Said my attic had bats and gables needed retired.  The honest company showed me my gables were clean and screening was in perfect condition.  This company told me they would find my check I had given the tech that didn’t show up for the work and would call me back.  Instead they cashed check for doing absolutely zero work!

resp.text:
Mrs. Meadows,

First off, I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Reviews help us improve. We looked into your situation and found the following; our former branch manager was the one who sold this work to you. At that time, he was filling in for a vacant position and was doing 2 jobs. He was very good at his job. It seems that he never scheduled for your work to be completed. We are very sorry for any inconveniences and will be happy to provide you with a refund for any in-completed work. Thank You and we are sorry for any inconveniences. As far as him charging you for things you do not need, we do not condone that type of behavior and we appreciate you bringing that to our attention. Since he is no longer an employee, we will not be addressing that with him but will certainly bring that up in our morning meeting tomorrow.

Sincerely,

Kyle Waltz, President

name: John Schueth
text: We had a family of armadillos living under our porch and Conserv trapped them all and sealed off the porch for a very reasonable price. I would highly recommend them if you need this service.

name: Kendall Henne
text: Great customer service and very professional.

name: Firas Nasr
text: I found a blind rakoon at my property so I called them to report this and hoping they could provide a help for the poor rakoon, but what the lady over the phone did is that she took my number and name and never heard from them :/ why the hell would you take my contact info and leave the poor rakoon blind and exposed to injuries or even death ? Nobody came to me or heard from them again. Don't call them they will not do any help for the poor animals.

resp.text:
Mr. Nasr,

I'm very sorry to hear about your experience. We do not handle any animal rescue, only nuisance wildlife removal. Your information was sent to an animal rescue agency for assistance and they should've contacted you. If you are ever in need of animal rescue, please contact the department of natural resources.

Thank You,

Kyle Waltz, President

name: Maranda Duchock
text:
I have read the reviews left here and am a little wary but so far pleased. Kyle came out the same day I called and helped identify entry points for mice and bats and scheduled someone to come out the next day to repair those exclusions. He was thorough, patient, and had good advice regarding our recent flea issue despite that not being within their offering. The price was a little higher than expected but seemed to cover all of our concerns. I will update with more to say when exclusions are fixed.

Update: repairs were made the day after our initial appointment, then someone came out to follow up a week or 2 after, and we've been checked in on via phone as well! Dedicated service and our concerns or additional issues were noted and covered under warranty so I feel our home is in good hands.

name: Charity Laister
text:
DONT USE THIS COMPANY! This company is a nightmare. I paid them a hefty sum up front to provide pest control and repair my home. I have waited five months with no assistance.

1. The first day of services they failed to show after making an appointment with me. I had taken a day off of work and reiterated this so they finally sent a guy named Kyle who took my payment and signed a contract with a bunch of promises they failed to fulfill.

2. Tech. Kyle scheduled a repairmen for the following week, but the tech never showed. Neither did the pest control worker.

3. I called conserv to alert them to these no shows, in response the pest control lady texted me in the middle of the week mid-day requesting to come to my house that day. (Like most ppl I couldn’t drop what i was doing).

4. The pest control worker texted me again and planned to visit the following week.

5. On the date of the visit, I again took off work, the pest control lady said she was too busy and couldn’t make it. We rescheduled.

6. On the next scheduled appointment she again couldn’t make it because she was “too busy”.

7. Finally, I put my foot down. Conserv scheduled an appointment for both workers. However, on the date of the repairmen appointment, I received a call that the repairmen stole the company truck and quit, but that they would get someone out as soon as possible.

8. Next, I received a text from the pest control lady saying she no longer worked there.

9. I eventually had someone come to the house and walk around. He promised that a repairmen would come soon.( this was in June).

10. To date (August), I have had no repairs. Mine you all of this started in March.

resp.text: Mrs. Laister, we are very sorry to hear that you have had a bad experience. I reviewed our records and found that we have been out to your home on multiple occasions to resolve your wildlife issue. I will have a manager contact you on Monday to schedule a visit and get everything resolved.

name: Megan Stones
text: I really felt like they cared about us and were willing to work with our hectic schedules for the appointments to check the traps.

We are very sorry to see you’ve had a bad experience. I have forwarded your information over to billing support to assist you with getting this resolved.

Thank You

name: Melissa Mann
text: I wish I would have had the good experience that I see in the reviews. Unfortunately,I called this past Thursday, June 28th, and informed the lady over the phone that I came home to a 3-4 foot copperhead the night before that was headed towards my dogs fence ( dogs about 2 feet away from them). Panicked I called the police that night and they unfortunately pepper sprayed him or her making the snake angry... after chasing the cop, it ended up going through a vent on the side of my house. First, I was told a Kyle would contact me and three to four hours later after not hearing anything I called back and she told me a different name (cant remember the name) and she said he would contact me shortly . I never heard anything from either of them. I have been paranoid about the snake and really wanted an ease of mind to know it was removed from under my house OR to be told it was no longer there. I also told the lady that I was afraid it could have gotten through a crack under the house and went into my home. I notice that you reply to these reviews so if you look under my account from the contact it will be under Melissa Clements.

resp.text:
Mrs Clements,

We are so sorry to hear no one got back to you. I am not sure what happened. If you would like, we can arrange to come out and perform a free inspection to determine if there is any current snake activity. Please reach back out.

name: Haiku Mama
text: Today was my second service with ClearDefense, and I am impressed. I held off on reviewing after my first service so I could also review the products that they use. The technicians: My first service was with Nathan, and he did an excellent job addressing my concerns and thoroughly treating the outside of my home. Today was my 30 day follow up of the initial service and I am equally, if not more so, impressed with the thorough job that Daniel did, as well as addressing any and all my concerns. Both men seemed to take pride in their work, were nice and polite as can be, were prompt, and went the extra mile to provide outstanding service. They are a credit to the ClearDefense company. As for the products used: I have noticed a drastic reduction in spiders in the garage, ants around the perimeter of my home, wasp activity, and insects in general. The glue traps they put down had minimal pests, unlike another company I previously used where the traps would have activity the day after service. I believe their products to be outstanding so far. As for the mosquito treatment, I will have to update this review at a later date, once I have determined the efficacy. I am a "biting critter" magnet and cannot step foot outside my home without repellant on, but so far, so good. I will continue with ClearDefense for my quarterly service, and would highly recommend them. Keep up the outstanding customer service guys, and you will have a lifetime customer. Now if y'all could do something about the heat and humidity....lol.
