name: Koddi Dunn
text: Horrible service!!!! We had them treat for ants...they promised to come monthly and only came once. We called and emailed repeatedly with no response until it was billing time.  Then all of a sudden TWO months later they show up. They have been useless. We were told it was $200 to cancel. Rebekah was totally unprofessional and the other rep wouldn't give her name at all. RUN FROM THESE GUYS. This was such a mistake!!!

resp.text: Hello Koddi Dunn, I am sorry to hear of your unfortunate pest control experience. However, Im searching our system by the name listed on your review and I can not find an account with the last Dunn in our Columbus district. I sincerely want to investigate your claim as soon as possible.  If you would would please give us a call at 770-954-9941 and ask for Roger Thompson or Andrew Davis. I look forward to hearing from you.

name: Dustin Ketchem
text:
Horrible customer service and dispatch system. We signed up for quarterly maintenance. They scheduled the first appointment and the guy was on time and listened to our concerns. It was a nightmare after that. Three months later we came home to a sign in our yard saying the maintenance had been performed. They never scheduled an appointment and treated our yard (the only space accessible) without our permission. They did the same on the third visit.

My wife is an avid gardener. We have over 100+ species of plant in our yard. They were asked on the initial consult to never treat the yard. We have living soil and use lady bugs and other insects to keep unwanted species out of the garden areas. When they treated those areas they wiped out all good species causing aphid and spider mite infestations.

On top of that we have free range chickens who eat throughout the yard. Bugs killed by insecticide eaten by chickens can pass trace amounts of chemicals into their eggs.

Bottom line.. they want the money but don’t want to provide quality service. They don’t make appointments on follow up visits, and they charge you for things you didn’t ask for.. or worse that you told them not to do.

We refused to pay the second bill. Asked them to terminate the service. They never terminated the service and instead did another follow up visit a third time, once again spraying our yard and destroying our ecosystem. And again.. charged us for something we asked them not to do; and never treated the inside of the house on either of the unscheduled follow up visits.

They want your money. That’s all.

name: Polly Bell
text: I have enjoyed the VIP service package from Active for over 2 years and I have been extremely satisfied with the service and pricing. I have recommended Active to my family and all my neighbors.

name: Jackson Turner
text:
I guess they have their friends posting good reviews, because they are horrible.  I show up at one of my rentals and see their truck.  He has informed my tenant that she has bedbugs and that "according to the law" it is the landlords responsibility to pay for the 1000 dollar treatment.  What he does not know is that her nasty neighbor tenant sneaked in dogs and filled her apartment with fleas.  So her friend tracks them across the hall.  So she is mad about her friend being thrown out and tracked in fleas and now she calls pest control instead of calling maintenance.  It is a scheme between friends to get me because her nasty neighbor is thrown out.  So this company swoops in and gets right in the middle of it all.  Starts playing attorney offering legal advice   Makes a big legal mess for a fast 1000 dollar hussle.  NOT one of these bugs have I seen.  Zero evidence.  I put out bug traps all of the time to keep tabs.  So with not one bug to show me, they get a major legal problem started using fear mongering with my tenants.  Anybody that owns residential real estate as an investment, send these people a letter barring them from your property.   Some of these bug men carry around bed bug carcasses to then "find" on site.  It would not surprise me if they participated in such as well.  It is easy money.  Dump one out, show it, bing bang boom a easy grand.

Follow up.  I put out bedbug specific traps all over the place and they trapped NOTHING.  If you will read their retort, you will see that they were on site doing an inspection and yet do not have a single bug or photo of a bug as proof of their results.  What company does any inspection and offers up NOTHING to support their results?  If they had found bugs, dont you think that a photo or a specimen would have been taken?  I have been in this business long enough to know what fraud smells like.  I have had all sorts of all types of inspections performed and NEVER did they not capture photographic or physical evidence to back it up.  No bug specimen, no photograph.  Just stirring up a legal conflict behind a nasty tenant being evicted.  The evicted tenant probably spends time "downtown" with the technician is the more likely scenario.
Follow up 2 - I did several interviews by withness and even the person that contacted Active Pest Control.
witness 1 - they closed the door and opened it in about two minutes.  Did not have time to perform an inepction
witness 2 (their customer) - they did not perform an inspection,   They took my wifes word for it.
Follow up 3 - I sent them 10 emails and their vice president is yet to call me.  They are LIARS.  No telling how many victims they play this scam on.

So no inspection, no proof,  and witnesses, including their own customer, and they are still clinging to their lie (if you will look at their retort).  These people are fraudsters and I advise anybody reading this to keep them far from your property.  I am of the opinion that they will intentionally contaminate your property for the fast money.

resp.text: Mr. Turner,  We service many properties that involve a tenant and landlord relationship and certainly know we have no business getting between that.  We also didn't quote $1000 for that job.  Possibly there was some creative word changes by your angry tenant?  The inspector said there was no conversation at all pertaining to whose responsibility it was to cure the issue. I'd be happy to have our Vice President call you if you'd like to email a contact number for him to call you on.  He has already looked into this situation and spoke to the Columbus manager (who was the actual inspector there at the property) and he guaranteed him that bed bugs were easily visible and would happily revisit the property, take pictures and collect evidence for you.  If you'd email your contact information to service@activepestcontrol.com, he will call you right away.

name: Nancy Davis
text: I used to struggle with indoor pests and was having treatment inside of the house and still seeing pests. United Pest Control suggested that we switch to outside treatment and it worked!

resp.text: Ms. Davis, thank you so much for the kind words. Our goal is to effectively control your pests with the best, most effective approach possible. For certain "infestations", interior service is still relevant and necessary...but as our industry has evolved it has become evident that prevention is key and that is best done on the perimeter of the home for most pests with the added bonus of no longer needing to put chemicals inside our homes when not absolutely necessary. It's truly a Win/Win. Thank you again for trusting in Team United for your pest control needs.

name: Chris Lindsey
text: I thought that I had a termite issue.  I contacted 3 different places to get an inspection and a quote.  David contacted me first and went to my house and inspected the outside.  He text me back and forth.  He eventually sent videos to show what he found on the outside.  To work with me, David was at my house at 6:45 AM the next morning to inspect and treat the inside.  They started that day treating the outside.  Great to work with and so glad they worked around my schedule to help me out.  I hope during 6 month inspection that I find out that they killed those little invasive pest.  But, I will say at this moment that they earned my respect for being prompt and working with me.  Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback Mr. Lindsey, we are grateful for all of our wonderful customers like yourself. Glad we were able to help!

name: Dana Heard
text: I have recently had an issue with a skunk. After setting live traps with no results the smell was still lingering and getting worse. After calling Trent Heard (No relation) back, he came promptly to go searching underneath the house. In the end, during a horrible storm that came up yesterday he found the decaying skunk and got it out of from under my house. All while getting soaked! He really did go above and beyond for us to find the source of our skunk smell that we had been dealing with for over a month!

resp.text: Thank you Dana for that wonderful feedback. Skunks can be pretty putrid even when they aren't decaying under your house 😖 We are happy that we could help!

name: Sandy Morris
text:
After years of being extremely satisfied with our locally owned lawn care service it was sold to another company due to the owners retiring. Although we were sorry to see them retire we understood and were going to give the new company a chance. To make a long story short it did not work out. The new company was not local, no customer service, hard to get in touch with, etc.  We heard that Spencer, who was once with our long time lawn service was at United Pest and Turf Co. We got in touch with him and told him we not only wanted to have their lawn service but also the pest and termite service as we were also not happy with our current pest service. Spencer got the ball rolling and had theTechs come out and talk to us and we have been more than pleased ever since. Our fescue lawn is beautiful and we have no pests or termites. My daughter recently bought a house and she has their services too and is pleased as well. United Pest and Turf have great customer service and go the extra mile for the customer. So happy to be their customers.  Thank you!

Lewis and Sandra Morris

name: J Brawner
text: I love United Pest control and the quick and effective pest control services I receive from my technician Cory Gowan. Cory is a wonderful young man and a true professional. I was nervous being transferred from my former tech Trent Heard to Cory but Trent was promoted and I quickly discovered Cory had been with the company learning his route and customers needs and the transition went very smoothly. Unlike most companies who pass around routes to various technicians United Pest makes a concerted effort to get a person familiar with a specific tech and that is wonderful difference. Any unexpected issue that came up Cory was quick to get with me and he is very knowledgable about all the products and services United Pest has to offer. No one else is better at pest emergencies than Cory and United Pest.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ms. Brawner! We greatly appreciate your feedback. Transitions can be scary and even from the technicians perspective, we hate to lose our customers that we've gotten to know over a period of time to another technician. I suppose that's part of the "growing pains" associated with being a part of a great company. Rest assured, you will receive the highest quality of service from us at United Pest & Turf Control, Inc. no matter the service area or technician. We will continue to do our very best in all aspects for our wonderful customers. Without you,  we are nothing....thanks for being a part of #TEAMUNITED.  -Trent

text: My grandparents have had United Pest Control for over 10 years now & have always been happy with their work. name: F. Slate
text: Trent is beyond awesome! After having him come out to investigate a bug issue in our rental home, he knew exactly what it was and answered every single one of my questions before treating and leaving the home. I'm the lady who hates insects so of course I had a million questions, like where they came from, what they are attracted to and how to prevent them in the future. He was very knowledgeable and he didn't get annoyed or frustrated with me asking questions. I appreciate the time he took to explain everything to me and to treat our home. We weren't just another service call to him, he took the time to treat the issue as if this was his own home and that was so awesome to see in a local company. I had previously used another local company for years and never once was left with the information and knowledge that Trent showed to us. We will be using him when our home is finished being built and would highly recommend him to anyone in the area.

text: My Terminix service in Montgomery has always been ourstanding. I have had their service since 2005 and had a termite bond on my home when I bought it. They had a man dig a trench around my home that they totally saturated with a termite treatment which formed a impenetrable boundary around my home against termites and pests. name: Tim moore
text:
I have been trying since 16 August to get them to come out and do their annual bait station inspection/replacement that i paid for ....as part of my contract....back in August. It's now early November, and to date....there have been MULTIPLE appointments....but something always happens. Either they:

1. Don't show up
2. Change the appointment date/time without consulting me
3. Show up, but don't do the work for one reason or another
4. Show up earlier than the appointment time, and don't do the work "because i wasn't there for the appointment" (of course, you came several hours BEFORE the appointment!)
5. Don't respond to my attempts to contact them to explain why this keeps happening

I'm simply amazed how long this keeps going on, and how incompetent and unreliable they are. Honestly, if i could get someone else to let me "transfer" my contract that I spent over a $1000 for....I'd GLADLY change to any other company. I feel sadly I'm stuck with their horrendous service.

I HIGHLY recommend you consider using another company before subjecting yourself to what I've gone through with them. Oh, they did the exact same thing LAST year....my first year for the annual inspection. They came early...and didn't do the work. Then the second time, they went to the wrong address/house. The third time LAST year, was "the charm"....and they finally got it right.

This year, we're going on two months and so many attempts...I've seriously lost track of just how many times they've tried to do the annual inspection.

Two years, both times the same unreliable service. I'm thinking about trying to go to their local location and trying to look someone in the eye and get some kind of explanation for how this can keep going on and on.

It's like "Groundhog Day"....the movie, I just keep reliving the same incompetence from them over and over.............

name: Juanireen “Mamareen” Trahan
text: The majority of people who work for Terminix are sound solid good folks. There are many misleading comments by a very few people who are not acquainted with Terminix policy nor their managing staff. Terminix will not pay for or fix areas in your home that had preexisting termite damage. This is in your contract. Take time to read it. Nor are they obligated to repair areas that are damage by neglect of the owner when it comes to water damage. Water damage IS NOT BUGS NOR TERMITES so no that is a neglectful situation caused by an owner not properly caring for your property by visually inspecting areas around pipes, in attic roof areas, around doors and windows on the exterior and interior of your home for leaks. It is common sense to take care of minor problems before they become major damage. And one particular person on here slammed my husband's character. I can promise you this, there is NO ONE more dedicated and honest with customers who are under his care than Ron Trahan. To indicate otherwise is a blatant lie on your part brought about by your ignorance of the terms of your contract. You makes threats of "seeing you in court", I would love to see you in court to try and undermine the character of my husband because I am sure you will walk away feeling ashamed and stupid for making that mistake. It is also against the law to make such false accusations so I would suggest you remove the public post which can be used to substantiate a claim against you for slanderous remarks against his character.  PLEASE NOTE Terminix has the best contract and policy in the industry for servicing your needs when it comes to bug infestation and termites and no one will treat you better as a client under his care for termite protection, than my husband, Ron Trahan. That is a FACT proven over and over again by those under his care who actually take time to read their contracts and fully understand what is and is not covered.

name: Marissa Wiles
text: Beyond disappointed in this branch. I can not believe the amount of grief you put your customers and your employees through. I would in no way trust the workmanship done under the guise of the managers in this branch. Ron and Danny let their sales people lie about the services that are being "provided" to their customer and have no qualms about it. Just recently it took a state employee completing an inspection to determine that the work had been sold incorrectly and treated incorrectly. The chemicals that are being used by this branch are being "eyeballed" and we're talking about federally regulated pesticides! How is this even possible? You should be ashamed of yourselves. You call yourselves managers but have no idea what management is even about. You force your workloads and blame onto your employees to make yourselves look golden and the CUSTOMERS are the ones who suffer in the end.

name: kristin
text: Absolutely horrible attitude and service, one star because zero isn't an option.  We are tenants in a house that had a bug problem when we rented it.  After trying to get our landlord to handle it we called terminix ourselves.  first of all they tried to cancel on me 2 and a half hours before the appointment when i had already prepared my house for the treatment.  they did send another tech out after about 30 minutes on the phone with them.  the technician did nothing but say jesus christ and oh my god and stood as far away from where he was spraying as he could like he was scared of the bugs.  i spent about 10 hours prepping my house so the treatment would be successful and it would be easy for the technician to do a good job.  i took everything out of my kitchen and pulled everything away from the walls.  he spent less than 30 minutes slinging chemicals around my house.  just drenched my kitchen in what he was spraying and barely touched the rest of the house if at all.  it seemed to just drive the bugs into the rest of my house from the kitchen instead of killing them.  he stood about 15 feet away from my house when he sprayed the liquid barrier outside.  he soaked my dishes (they would have gotten less chemicals on them if i had left them in my house), he got it all over my dogs toys and they had to be thrown away, he sprayed my potted strawberry plants and killed every single one of them.  when he was done he proceeded to pet my dog and stick his hands in the dogs mouth without washing them after he sprayed them chemicals. i now have a claim with them for potential poisoning of an animal.  i honestly had better success with cans of raid from home depot than this terminix treatment.  and to top it all off as we are in the process of cancelling the yearly contract and hopefully not being billed for the bang up job this tech did, they sent us a bill for $50 more than we ever agreed to pay.  i even have a receipt from terminix reflecting the lower price.

name: Lanita Parker
text: Just started using this week. So far, every step of the experience has been outstanding. Talked to a sales professional on Monday (Justin) and he was able to schedule my first lawn service today; my mosquito service is scheduled on Friday. He was super courteous, knowledgeable and professional. Also I have talked to two receptionists this week who were also for friendly and met my needs. I wished I had gotten their names as well! A courteous receptionist is a must for businesses and sometimes not as appreciated as they should be. Today Todd performed my first lawn service. He was very friendly and was so thorough in his lawn application, being careful to really saturate any problem areas. He took about an hour to complete the service. I used a different lawn service last year and they were usually finished in about 15 minutes and were not nearly as thorough and were more expensive. Anxious to see how the lawn progresses over the next few months. Again, I can’t say enough about Todd! Great job!

name: Freeman I
text: Tyler and Todd did an awesome job on my yard. Within a week, the weeds have turned yellow (dying).  I have pulled some up by root and as you can see from the photo, they are dying. I was also advised that if the weeds do not show signs of dying within a couple of weeks, contact them for a service call. The receptionist was also very nice and courteous, which means a lot to me. A+, I highly recommend this company.

name: Kyle Williams
text: I have been using Lawn Doctor of Madison for 2-3 years now. When I purchased my home, the yard was overrun with weeds. After calling Wesley, who was an absolute professional, I was able to craft a treatment plan that best suited my property. Wesley was even able to maximize savings through current deals, and really made my decision to go with Lawn Doctor an easy one. They are absolutely affordable, and come back at zero charge if there are weeds in your yard - this pays for itself in no-time! Thanks again Wesley!

name: Robin Zich
text: When I moved into new house it was 75% weed infested.  Within a short period they got rid of the weeds which left bare spots everywhere.  with proper fertilization and continued weed service the bermudagrass quickly filled in the holes. looks great.

name: Richard Flood
text: Starr Womack and the Lawn Doctor of Madison-Decatur tend to my yard as if it were their own!

name: Leonard Burton
text:
I have tried several lawn care services in the past, and even self-treated my lawns all with mediocre success. Lawn Doctor has serviced my lawn for three years now and I have a rich vibrant lawn, free of weeds and fungus.

Any time I call for additional applications they respond immediately.  My route manager Wesley and Technician Todd are very knowledgeable of the products and techniques they use, and readily explain what's happening with the lawn when asked.

Neighbors and people passing by consistently ask how did I get my lawn so healthy.

text:
I have attempted for six consecutive days to contact Terminix via phone and voicemail, email, and text messages regarding an upcoming appointment. The techs have been friendly, professional, and knowledgeable but the company’s inability to maintain even the essential framework of a customer service department is mind-boggling. I would not recommend their services to anyone. I guarantee your local pest control service will more eagerly accept or return your calls.

Hire a local team. Booking with this Terminix is a huge mistake. Trust them with nothing.

text: Wonderful service guy. Not much result.

text: How can a termite Bond increase from 379 to 949, a $570 increase (150%). No CALL. When calling to set a renewal, I was told an inspector is coming Fri. at the new rate: $949. Isn't a 150% increase deserve call to your customer? Anyone Else UPSET?

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We apologize for your recent experience and would like to help you. Please send us an e-mail at socialsupport@terminix.com. Listing your full-service address and the phone number associated with the account?

name: Jennifer Murray
text: Did not deliver on their promises and one of their employees acted like they didn't believe i was telling the truth when i complained.  :(

name: Jeanne Hurlbert
text: These folks are fabulous. Eric, our technician, is absolutely wonderful.

name: Joyce Varner
text: The technician was informative, courteous, answered our questions, gave timely attention to everything.  Outstanding as always.

name: Carol Drinnon
text: They dont return calls and do not show up as promised.  They even lied about my termite coverage.

name: Connie Duncan
text: I truly appreciate the professionalism that is always exhibited during the service. When I have a question, the technician is always ready to answer with patience and detailed explanations

name: none none
text:
11/20/17 Came out to check out scope of work to be done, quoted me and I signed info for work to be done on ipad. Later emailed me the quote which was wrong, was not what he quoted me verbally. Called numerous of times to change to what I was quoted verbally, never changed. Never called concerning service to be done or when they were coming out for appointment to spray. Finally I just told them to forget it and don't come, cancel,  I found another company!! (very aggravated at this point)

12/22/17 They finally came out unexpected and sprayed. They guy who sprayed our building and yard was a really friendly and great guy. Talked to me about everything and said that he would get with them and have them fix everything.

12/27/17 Still haven't heard from Terminix! smh

name: Michael T Kelly
text: I have been using Terminix for the past 18 years.  I have found them to be very responsive  and the service they provide works.   From normal household pest to termites.   They're GONE !!!

name: David Brown
text: I was impressed with my inspection - and I really appreciated the professionalism and thoroughness of your Mr. Jason Lucas' work

name: Karen Hunter
text: Paid for termite bond and service for 20 years yet they declined paying for repairs. Said they hadn't treated the ground before house was built and that was the only way it would be covered. So what was all the $$ for? They are terrible about answering the phone and returning calls as well. Horrible.

name: Angel Lord
text: Very good service... very impressed

name: Tommy Robinson
text: Bryan is awesome and very friendly and respectful!! He is very thorough!!

name: Nancy H
text: I have  Fred also, if he goes, I go!  what a great man

name: Jess B
text: The worst business I have ever dealt with. They do not want to be held accountable for anything. They do not return calls. I am certain that they have overlooked my damage throughout the years. After more than a month, still have not provided me with my policy information because they know I have termite damage. Termite manager put all the responsibility on me to fix the issue and cannot get them back out to address damage or live termites. I have called a hundred times and everyone tells me something different. They will completely give you the run around. Do not use this horrible company.

name: Donnie Hoover
text: Great Company!

resp.text: Thanks for sharing your positive experience, Donnie. We're committed to being your trusted provider for all your pest control needs! Please give us a call if we can help you further!

name: Nicki Laux
text: Don’t send your people out to solicit in a neighborhood that prohibits soliciting!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We apologize for your recent experience and would like to help you. Please send us an e-mail at socialsupport@terminix.com. Listing your full-service address and the phone number associated with the account?

name: Steve M
text: Professional and friendly.

name: Stacy Forbess
text: Our Fairhope Terminix guy always goes the extra mile. Yesterday he killed a wasp nest that we didn't even know was there. And I told him I'd seen roaches in the garage and today those ugly bugs are belly up. Thanks!

name: Allie Shermjjbjb an
text: This is the 3rd time they have rescheduled on us after we had to make plans to leave the 3rd time I'm so unhappy with there service we have jobs during the week and is hard for us to make time for them to come.

name: Derrick Rorex
text: Great job as always

name: David Mercer
text: Friendly, affordable, effective.

name: Steve M
text: Professional and friendly.

name: Annon Muse
text: We have used SEE since 1996. The annual inspection & treatment has been timely, the people are polite and accommodating. Most importantly, no termites.

name: Pat McDonald
text: We inherited a termite bond from this company and they took our money for 2 years then all of a sudden if you have a stucco house then you have to cut 6 inches from the ground around the bottom of the entire perimeter of the house. On top of that it would be $2000 to renew the bond. Another reputable company came in and the house is NOT below grade as they said. They were fine with a new bond that will be cheaper on a yearly basis anyway. It’s unbelievable how a company can just pick and choose even if the facts state that the house is in compliance with no signs of any damage. Just bad biz.

name: Jessica Nesmith
text: I have held a termite bond with this company since 2016. Today, I had the annual inspection and was told that I must pay $650 for my bond renewal with the now required Centricon home treatment. I waived Centricon last year, due to it being an unnecessary expense. I refuse to pay for something I do not need, and I was not notified of sooner prior to my bond expiring. Very unprofessional to say the least, and I will no longer be a customer.

name: Matthew Kimble
text:
AVOID THEM!

We had Southeastern as our exterminator the first few months after we moved into our new home. Most of their products did little to nothing to prevent our ant problem, but their technicians were always very friendly and explanatory (the technicians are the only good part of this company).

After some very delayed billing and a home office that never picked up the phone, I saw the writing on the wall and asked them to cancel all future appointments. Thank goodness we didn't sign a contract.

I had an awkward experience today where, after we haven't talked to them for nearly a year, they showed up to render service with an appointment I never scheduled. Myself and the tech were unsure as to how that happened, but having a strong administrative office would probably prevent things like that from happening. I went with Terminix, who immediately killed every ant in and under our home, and bill us on time.

name: Katherine Ballenger
text: Had the absolute pleasure of speaking with this company, Jessi specifically. So knowledgeable, kind, and professional. I would give them 10 stars if I could.

name: Phillip B.
text:
We bought a new home 12 years ago in Semmes. We had. A service contract with them . Well, this year they
Decided to add a treatment for an extra $360.00 and that that service is mandatory or they won’t renew.
I am not going to be taken advantage of.
I won’t be doing business with these people and if you care about your finances you won’t either.
Watch your back.

name: S. A. N.
text: I will not use this company again in the future as I cannot do business with liars.  When I called this year to schedule my yearly termite inspection for the termite bond, I asked how much it would be this year.  The employee who answered the phone pretended not to know the price and suggested it would probably be the same as it was last year, $225. However, I received a bill for $360, a drastic increase from the year before.  When I called the company back to inquire about this price hike, the same employee answered the phone (I recognized her voice).  This time, she was very clear about the price increase and stated the change in price with certainty.  If your employee can lie with ease about something so trivial, I don’t trust that this company would actually honor any details stated in the supposed contract/termite bond if I did ever have some actual termite damage.

name: Jessi Lami
text: The office staff is absolutely amazing. Great to work with.

name: The Taylor-Family
text: Very disappointed on service and how this company refused to follow up on numerous request for help with my service.   Moved on to another company and it was a good decision.

name: Amanda Zitzman
text:
This company refused to service our home.  Our home has never had termite damage and has always been under a termite bond (with a different company.)  It has always been inspected annually and receives preventative treatments as recommended by the company holding the termite bond.
We wanted to switch to Southeastern Exterminating because they offer transferrable termite bonds.  They said they would not service our home because it had been under bond with a different company(terminex), and the other company had done normal preventative maintenance.  We submitted all documentation stating there was no damage and any former treatment had only been preventative.  They still would not cover our home.

name: Tack Bower
text: I have been with this company for 18 years, since my house was built. My termite bond was up for renewal in January/February. I forgot and called them a month later to make my appointment. They told me they could not renew me because I was “late”. They said they had to quote me a new contract. They came out today and quoted me $1425 and then $1100 each year for renewal. HIGHWAY ROBBERY! My renewal has been no more than $250 per year.  I can’t believe they would do this to an 18 year customer. I now have to find a new company. No loyalty at all.

name: Pablo Matheu
text: Great service and very competitive pricing, been a customer since 2009!

name: Marshall Farley
text: My termite bond expired. The bond was already in place with this company when we purchased our house.  I never received a renewal notice and of course the bond expired. I figured I would call them to get a new bond. Big mistake. The technician came out and had more interest in criticizing our choice of paint colors and style (as if he worked for Architectural Digest in a previous life) and pointing out repairs made prior to us buying our home than he did in attaining our business. Then made up some lame BS excuse why they would not renew our bond. Used another company instead that wanted my business.

name: Brad Warren
text: They raise prices without warning.  THis has happened more than once over the years I've dealt with Southeastern.  They won't give reason for price increases (last one was 65%), are unresponsive when asking for paperwork, and lack any semblance of customer service.  I urge you to avoid this company.

name: Robert Stewart
text: Has some serious billing issues. Have not received a bill in months from them. Even called them concerned because I hadn't received a bill and paid off my balance. Then I get a notice that I've been sent to collections and I now have a ding on my perfect credit.... Yeah, not happy.

name: Matthew McCormick
text: Great people great service

name: shay hunter
text: I paid my bond and still waiting on the contract. I was told when I made my payment that she will have contract in mail next day. It's going on 2 weeks.

name: Marcus Carroll
text: Shawn provided me with a thorough inspection, quote and was right on time! Southeastern provides Sentricon protection.

name: SHAWN Lowther
text: Very respectful of.your.home...very friendly staff.

name: James Ekelund
text: Prompt professional and thorough service!

name: David Heinig
text: If you want a technician to show up when scheduled look elsewhere.  How are you late to the first appointment of the day.  Very poor work ethic and no apology for being late.

name: Anthony Noonan
text: Great Family Business.

name: j culver
text: Really nice people to work with

name: Charlotte Roper
text: Service is good

name: Judy Riley
text: These people came knocking on my door at ten o'clock Wednesday night. It scared me to death.  That could have waited until morning. I will let termites eat my home before I use this company.

name: Bregetta Montgomery
text: Fast and delicious!

name: Jeff Baker
text: The people at Wayne's are courtesy, thorough and professional. Neal in particular is especially attentive to my lawn concerns because he understands me. Daniel is in charge of keeping the bugs away and he's always cheerful and professional as well. I highly recommend their services.

name: Paul Dunbar
text: Cedric was the best. He was on time. He was Thorough and took time explain the process and everything that he was very professional. When it comes to termite protection Waynes is your best choice.

name: Trisha Holman
text: Wayne’s is incredible. Neal came to do our first pest control treatment and noticed wasp and also took care of those for us. Great company, great people!

name: Jon Johnson
text: Wayne’s is always very responsive to my requests and they follow up to make sure the issue was corrected. They have very reasonable rates and a professional staff. I’m very happy with the service Wayne’s has provided.

name: David Pearson
text: First time using Wayne's pest control. Have to say, really impressed so far. Today, a technician named Daniel came to our house and he was very professional and thorough in how he conducted himself and sprayed for potential insects inside and outside of our home. I would highly recommend Wayne's pest control based on the service we have received.

name: Abbie Hirsch
text: Wayne’s Pest Control has provided professional termite control and annual inspection since 2017. We are happy with the service and the courteous technicians.

name: Joanne Gilson
text: Since using Wayne's my lawn looks great.

name: Michael Hamer
text: Always responsive. Always willing to help with general lawn care tips. Always friendly. Neal Faulkner in particular is one of the most responsive and kind individuals I’ve ever dealt with in any service or industry I’ve ever used.

name: Erik Estill
text: Very professional and pleasant serviceman. Easy to work with and reasonably priced.

name: ELIZABETH REID
text: My experience as always is professional, friendly and courteous. This is why I use Waynes Pest Services.

name: Jessica White
text: Not the greenest yard in the neighborhood but they did get rid of my weeds this summer.

name: Tarik Orgen
text:
Very dependable,
Professional with good results...

name: Julie Freeman
text: Very polite and professional technician!

name: Jameal Brown
text: Great service, reliable, professional and reasonably priced.

name: Dale Morris
text: Great service, friendly staff.

name: sam wootten
text: Daniel has been very kind and considerate, and always checks to make sure we aren’t experiencing any issues.

name: Stephanie Olsen
text: Just moved into Auburn and Wayne’s came right out and did pest control for us. Cedric was on time and friendly. Thank you.

name: kimberly mccadden
text: Sprayed outside around the perimeter of the house

name: sj seung-jae jung
text: Good service!

name: Michael Mathews

text:
Overall a great experience! They did our WIR and I was very pleased at how quick they were able to work me in. They were also very courteous to us and our requests during the covid-19 outbreak by practicing safe social distancing while doing their inspection. This is truly a company that cares about their customers and their well-being!

I definitely recommend this great company to anyone! A+++++

name: Marvin Grier
text: Awesome service...goes above and beyond, what is required....very knowledgeable...great people..

resp.text: Thank you Marvin!

name: Cory Skelton
text: Rogue Pest Solutions is the best! I would never even consider using anyone else. Robert is always available and happy to help with any issues that may arise. His number one priority is customer service, which is hard to find these days, and we appreciate all he does. I would highly recommend Rogue Pest Solutions.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mrs. Skelton!

name: Michelle Yancey
text: Rogue Pest Solutions is the real deal! Ran by a caring individual that will do whatever is best for you, and your family! Plus his knowledge and professionalism is amazing!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Yancey!

name: Bobby Garrett
text: Over the years of being a home owner, renter or apartment living, We have used several pest control services, some were efficient, some were not. But when we moved back to Rainbow City, after living in Centre Al for 10 years, we were very fortunate to find this company and Robert Storey. He came to our home to meet us and explain what and how he would control any pest we happened to have. We were impressed immediately, an agreement was reached and Rouge Pest Solutions has been and still is the best, most honest and reliable pest control company we have ever used. We completely trust his judgement and recommend Robert and Rogue Pest Solutions highly. . .

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Garrett! I truly enjoy providing pest service for you and your wife!

name: Scottie Peoples
text: Robert is amazing. We have used Rogue Pest for almost two years since purchasing our new home. Robert always goes above and beyond what is required of him. I would highly recommended Rogue pest to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Peoples! We appreciate your business!

name: Sandy Cherry
text: Robert is Wonderful! He always goes above and beyond, you can not find a better Pest Control! I Highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you For your business Mrs. Cherry!
